channel.title: Kady Dennis — Mission Logs
channel.description: Thoughts on AI workflows, travel operations, and building systems that actually work for luxury travel advisors.

item.title: Why I Built the Pinchy Army: A Travel Advisor's Journey into AI
item.author: kady@eliavatravel.com (Kady Dennis)
item.description: The real story behind Pinchy, my AI army, and why I believe every travel advisor needs a digital partner—not a replacement, but an extension of what makes them extraordinary at their craft.
item.content:encoded:
The first time I watched Pinchy write an email that sounded exactly like me, I felt a strange mix of awe and existential dread. Was I about to make myself obsolete?

It was 3 AM. I'd been wrestling with a client's complex multi-generational safari trip for hours. The research was done, the lodges selected, the itinerary mapped—but I still had to craft the proposal email.

I typed a quick prompt into my AI assistant. Thirty seconds later, I had an email that captured my voice, referenced the client's specific concerns about traveling with teenagers, and wove in the personal touches I'd normally spend an hour perfecting.

Read the full mission log →

item.title: Why I Chose ClickUp Over Every Travel-Specific CRM
item.author: kady@eliavatravel.com (Kady Dennis)
item.description: The uncomfortable truth about "industry-specific" software and why flexibility beats features every single time. Plus: my exact ClickUp workspace setup for $3M+ travel advisors.
item.content:encoded:
I've tried them all. TravelJoy. Travefy. ClientBase. The big names, the niche players, the "built specifically for travel advisors" solutions that promise the world.

They all failed me. Not because they're bad products—some are genuinely well-designed—but because they make a fundamental error: they assume all travel advisors work the same way.

Here's the dirty secret: every successful luxury travel advisor I know has a unique workflow.

Read the full mission log →

item.title: The 15-Minute Inquiry Response That Books 40% More Trips
item.author: kady@eliavatravel.com (Kady Dennis)
item.description: How luxury travelers actually choose their advisors, and the AI-assisted workflow that lets you respond with genuine personalization in under 15 minutes—without sounding robotic.
item.content:encoded:
Here's a number that should terrify every luxury travel advisor: the advisor who responds first wins the client 70% of the time.

Not the cheapest. Not the most experienced. The fastest.

But there's a catch—luxury travelers can smell a template from a mile away.

So how do you balance speed with personalization? I spent two years A/B testing this. Here's the system that converted 40% more inquiries.

Read the full mission log →
